content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Smelting Area at position(0,0)
Consists of multiple furnaces:
- Stone furnace at position(0,0)
- Stone furnace at position(2,0) 
- Stone furnace at position(4,4) with coal fuel and iron plates
- Stone furnace at position(6,4) with coal fuel

###Inserter Production Line at position(23.5,2.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 1 at position(23.5,2.5)
- Input wooden chest at position(20.5,2.5)
- Output wooden chest at position(26.5,2.5) containing 190 inserters
- Burner inserter at position(21.5,2.5) with coal fuel, moving items from input chest to assembler
- Burner inserter at position(25.5,2.5) with coal fuel, moving items from assembler to output chest

###Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5,24.5) producing water
- Boiler at position(-2.5,24.0)
- Steam engine at position(4.5,24.5)
- Connected pipe network for water and steam
- Electric pole network connecting multiple poles

###Research Area
Multiple labs at various positions:
- Lab with 12 automation and 14 logistic science packs
- Lab with 23 automation science packs
- Lab with 74 automation science packs
- Lab with 40 automation and 40 logistic science packs
- Several other labs without science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to missing fuel in boiler
- Check coal levels in boiler before starting production cycles
- Harvest coal when inventory is low to maintain continuous power generation

### Errors related to crafting items requiring smelting
- Cannot directly craft items requiring smelting (like iron plates)
- Must use furnace to smelt ore into plates before crafting items needing those plates

### Errors related to assembler ingredient shortages
- Ensure all required ingredients are available in input chest before starting production
- Monitor ingredient levels to maintain continuous production
- Required ingredients for inserter production: iron plate, iron gear wheel, electronic circuit

### Power system issues
- Monitor power system stability
- Ensure boiler has sufficient coal and water supply
- Keep steam engine connected to electrical network
